Name: Perfect Guest
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Clean, grainy vodka forms the backbone of this floral and herbal delicate dessert Vodkatini-style cocktail.
History: Created by Giuseppe Santamaria for the Spanish World Class 2012 bartender competition.
Nutrition: One serving of Perfect Guest contains 152 calories
